title.rendered: Study for Life – applications now open

content.rendered:
Study for Life is a study and mentoring programme for those who have just finished their first year of high school/gymnasium. We understand that the road to university can feel long – perhaps even more so for those whose families do not have an academic background or who have studied outside Sweden. Our goal is to make the road feel shorter.

The programme runs for two years and you will have two mentors to provide support and follow your development throughout the programme. You will also participate in activities such as exciting study visits and have the opportunity to practice your presentation skills.

The first group of participants have just had their final meeting, and it has been fantastic to follow their development. We wish them all the best for the future. We are now looking forward to meeting our new participants!

The application period for 2023 is open until 30 September. For more information about the programme and how to apply, click here.
